definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
to receive (a visitor)/to admit (allow sb to enter)
to wait for an opportunity/(electronic devices) standby
impatient (idiom); in a hurry/itching to get on with it
lit. to wipe one's eyes and wait (idiom); to wait and see

sentences.english: The remaining places on the Middletons' front row are yet to be confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 剩餘的座位安排尚有待確定。

sentences.english: When I come to Shengzhou, I always stay there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次來嵊舟，都會待在那裏。

sentences.english: After treating the pus, namely can swell draws back the pus, rapid cicatrization.
sentences.chinese: 待出膿後，即能腫退膿盡，迅速癒合。

sentences.english: I have to be in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我是非待在城市不可的人。

sentences.english: More experimental deta are needed for the comparison of these two theories .
sentences.chinese: 要比較這兩個理論，尚需待進一步的實驗。

sentences.english: When I finished counting the men I had left.
sentences.chinese: 待我清點完人數我就得出發。

sentences.english: So, how long are you staying in Wilmington?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，你要在威爾明頓待多久？

sentences.english: He sometimes stays at the office alone when he's on a case.
sentences.chinese: 一忙起來，他就經常獨自一人待在辦公室。

sentences.english: The longer you stay here, the more you will like the place.
sentences.chinese: 你在這裏待得愈久，你愈會喜愛那個地方。

sentences.english: Insert it in the foam while it drys .
He read many books, he went to the theatre, and in the summer he stayed in the country for six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他讀了許多書，去看過戲，在鄉間避暑待了六個星期。

sentences.english: He said Ms. Choi became upset when she found the dog alone at his home.
sentences.chinese: 他說崔順實發現小狗獨自待在他家以後變得很生氣。

sentences.english: yeah, help yourself, stay or whatever.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她請我們自便，待著或做其他的。

sentences.english: The utility of this rescue equipment has still to be assessed in a real emergency.
sentences.chinese: 這種救生設備的功用還有待在真正的緊急情況中評定。

sentences.english: And I was there for 15 years.
The old man treated her as his own daughter.
sentences.chinese: 這老人待她就像他自己的親生女兒。

definition: to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
